Generated Narrative: ValueSet TipoDeObservacion

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in https://interoperabilidad.minsal.cl/fhir/ig/quirurgico/CodeSystem/CSTipoObservacionMinsal
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    84100007History taking
  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    CodeDisplay
    101720-1Disability status
    95385-1Caregiver for person with age-related complaints, chronic diseases or frailty

name: TipoDeObservacion
title: Tipo de Observación
description: Estas son algunas de las observaciones que se pueden realizar en un encuentro, que permiten dar antecedentes a la interconsulta.
